newsitem.title: INDIA: India sugar prices in setback after recent upsurge.
newsitem.headline: India sugar prices in setback after recent upsurge.

text.p: Indian sugar prices on Friday suffered losses after a recent upsurge, dealers said.
Demand resistance at the higher level capped a rally while fresh offerings by millers and improved arrivals prompted profit-taking by the local stockist.
Ready delivery sugar S-30 fell by 4/7 rupees at 1,428/1,463 rupees per quintal while sugar M-30 moved down by 10 rupees at 1,450/1,500 rupees per quintal.
"Sugar mill delivery also moved down to 1,365/1,375 rupees per quintal from 1,380/1,400 rupees as outstation buying at the mill level eased at the higher level," one broker said.
